name: Limits (autumnalheart)
description:
For Ludum Dare 49

Genre: 2D Top Down Puzzle

A somewhat surreal 2D Topdown Puzzle game.

---

Unfortunately, the ending sequence doesn't work, and not all the levels are in. However, it can still be played to some extent, so I'm uploading it now.

Once the Jam is over, I think I'll may come back to it to make it more functional.
